tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Alexander Payne teams up with Paul Giamatti to tell a warm-hearted holiday tale. A cranky New England school instructor is forced to babysit a handful of students during Christmas.

programme.title: Helens Dead
programme.desc: A gripping whodunnit murder mystery. A young woman goes to confront her cousin about cheating with her boyfriend, only to find her dead, and everybody is a suspect.

programme.title: My Dead Dad
programme.desc: A poignant drama about a young man who inherits an apartment complex from his estranged late father. Hoping to sell it, he learns about the dad he never knew through the tenants.

programme.title: One True Loves
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by bestselling author Taylor Jenkins Reid. A woman finds herself torn between her fiance and her husband, who is believed to be dead. Who is her one true love?

programme.title: The Secret Kingdom
programme.desc: A thrilling fantasy adventure. At their new home, Peter and his sister are drawn into an underground kingdom, where Peter is declared the king and must save the realm from evil.

programme.title: Headspace
programme.desc: When a team of aliens is stranded in a teenage boys brain, they must enlist his help to save the Earth from Zolthard, an intergalactic villain whos stuck in the school principals head.

programme.title: Camp Hideout
programme.desc: A troublesome crime comedy. After a teen steals an important item from two big-city goons, he hides in a church summer camp and must protect his newfound friends.

programme.title: White Bird
programme.desc: This moving book-inspired film is the sequel to Wonder (2017). Struggling at his new school, former bully Julian gets a visit from his grandmother, who shares a story of her past.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: A riveting and epic adventure written and directed by Chris Saunders. Voiced by Lupita Nyongo, Roz, a robot stranded on a wild island, must adapt and confront her past to survive.

programme.title: Unbreakable Boy
programme.desc: Zachary Levi stars in this heartfelt, inspiring film based on a real-life story of a familys struggles and triumphs as they care for their autistic son with brittle bone disease.

programme.title: Conclave
programme.desc: Secrets, drama, power, and faith collide in this starry book-inspired church thriller. After the Pope dies, Cardinal Lawrence is tasked with organising the conclave to elect a new Pope.

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: In this funny action film, scammers meet their match in June Squibb. After getting duped, a 93-year-old grandmother sets out to reclaim what was taken from her.

programme.title: Alarum
programme.desc: A guns-blazing action thriller. Two rogue spies who start a new secret life together off the grid find themselves hunted by various intel agencies seeking a stolen hard drive.

programme.title: Backtrace
programme.desc: A Sylvester Stallone crime thriller. After getting amnesia from a failed robbery, a man is given a drug that stimulates memory. Now on the run, he fights the clock and his past.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: Dylan OBrien leads this sci-fi thriller. When a girl disappears on Caddo Lake, a series of past deaths and disappearances begin to link together, altering a broken familys history.

programme.title: Maxxxine
programme.desc: The gruesome third instalment in the X trilogy. Years after surviving a massacre, adult film star Maxine Minx leaps to mainstream fame, but her big break is being threatened.

programme.title: Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story
programme.desc: A powerful, sincere documentary about actor Christopher Reeve, who became quadriplegic and subsequently worked as a disability rights advocate.

programme.title: The Unbreakable Tatiana Suarez
programme.desc: A hard-hitting documentary. The incredible story of Tatiana Suarez, who overcame a broken neck and cancer to return to Mixed Martial Arts, and be one of the best fighters.

programme.title: The Lost Girls
programme.desc: Inspired by the classic tale of Peter Pan, but with a feminist twist. Four generations of Darling women struggle with the aftermath of their adventures in Neverland.

programme.title: Cassino In Ischia
programme.desc: Expect a hilarious journey of mishaps, reinvention, and unexpected discoveries. An out-of-favour action star tries to revive his career and travels to Italy to film an action movie.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: A feel-good animation. A goofy streetwise cat has the perfect money-making scam that involves a dumb-looking, pipe-playing kid and a horde of strangely literate rats.

programme.title: Gracie and Pedro: Pets To The Rescue
programme.desc: A fun, furry animated adventure. Family frenemies, Gracie and Pedro, must put their differences aside, embarking on a thrilling quest in order to reunite with their owners.

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: An epic animated adventure for the whole family. Two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey, where they make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 4
programme.desc: Po is chosen to become the spiritual leader of the Valley of Peace in the fourth instalment. He must train a new Dragon Warrior while a wicked sorceress plans to re-summon master villains.

programme.title: Flight Risk
programme.desc: Things are not as they appear in this thriller from Mel Gibson. On a small plane, a US Marshal escorts a government witness, but the pilot (Mark Wahlberg) turns out to be an assassin.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: A riveting action comedy. A realtor is pulled back into his old life by his former partner-in-crime. With his crime-lord brother also on his trail, he must confront his past.

programme.title: Cash Out 2: High Rollers
programme.desc: The risks are twice as high in this sequel to the 2024 crime action. Mason (John Travolta) and his crew attempt a high-stakes casino heist to save his kidnapped girlfriend.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: Michael Fassbender faces the ultimate test of loyalty in this espionage thriller. An intelligence officer is tasked with finding a mole, only to find his wife is a suspect.

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: Action star Frank Grillo leads an all-star cast in this slugfest. Trapped in a time loop that repeats the day of his murder, a former special-ops agent must uncover how he died.

programme.title: Black Balsam
programme.desc: A thriller filled with twists and turns. A couple finds their dream home. But dreams turn to nightmares when the deceased owners son takes revenge on the new owners.

programme.title: Alex Edelman: Just For Us
programme.desc: After an acclaimed, extended run on Broadway, comedian Alex Edelman brings his solo show to HBO in an all-new comedy special.

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Fun-loving comedy starring Katherine Heigl and Seth Rogen. After a wild night of partying, a career woman discovers that shes pregnant, with hilariously truthful consequences.

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs
programme.desc: Russell Crowe drives this crime drama filled with mystery and intrigue. An ex-homicide detective with memory loss is forced to solve a brutal murder, uncovering chilling secrets.

programme.title: The Skeleton Key
programme.desc: This thrilling horror with Kate Hudson is filled with secrets and death as Hudson, a hospice nurse, finds herself working at a run-down and menacing New Orleans plantation.

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx gives an Oscar winning performance in this biographical drama. A child with an extraordinary talent suffers a tragedy but his music eventually takes the world by storm.

programme.title: My Girl
programme.desc: In this classic coming-of-age story, a young girl with a morbid outlook on life becomes distressed when her widowed father falls for another woman.

programme.title: My Girl 2
programme.desc: In this charming and poignant sequel set two years later, Vada travels to LA to research her mothers life for a school assignment.

programme.title: Dennis The Menace
programme.desc: Its chaos from start to finish in the live-action version of a cartoon favourite. While being his usual menace to the neighbourhood, Dennis must take on a cat burglar.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Eddie Murphys comic genius shines in this buddy cop classic. A Detroit cop pursues a murder investigation to Beverly Hills, but he struggles with the very different lifestyle.

programme.title: Batman V Superman: Dawn Of Justice
programme.desc: The Man of Steel and the Dark Knight face-off in an epic battle in this much-anticipated superhero epic from director Zack Snyder.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: An action thriller piloted by Gerard Butler. A pilot saves his passengers from a storm by landing on a war-torn island, putting all of them in the path of dangerous rebels.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Contemporary and fun, this acclaimed rom-com sees native New Yorker Rachel Chu head to Singapore to meet her boyfriends family, who, unbeknownst to her, are all super-rich elites.

programme.title: Snakes On A Plane
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson takes centre stage in this over-the-top action movie. An FBI agent must take on a plane filled with venomous snakes that were released to kill a witness.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: Liam Neeson must save his family in this action thriller. A bank executive receives a bomb threat while driving his children to school that his car will explode if they leave.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: In this colossal action drama from director Peter Jackson, a film crew heads to a remote island to shoot a movie but encounters a legendary beast that could spell their end.

programme.title: The Aviary
programme.desc: A thought-provoking, chilling psychological thriller. Two women flee into the New Mexican desert to escape an insidious cult. However, they feel its leader is following them.

programme.title: Million To One
programme.desc: Love, self-discovery and family are at the core of this rom-com. A social media rising star returns home for a wedding, only to go from family liability to saviour.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard
programme.desc: When his brother is murdered, a street dancer moves to Georgia to work his way through college. He joins a fraternitys step dancing team for a competition.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Tim Burton and Michael Keaton team up to make a creepy, dark, fun experience. A recently deceased couple hire a sleazy ghost to get rid of their homes new occupants.

programme.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The...
programme.sub-title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Fellowship Of The Ring
programme.desc: Peter Jackson brings J.R.R. Tolkiens classic to life. A hobbit embarks on a quest to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

programme.title: Cradle 2 The Grave
programme.desc: Jet Li plays a Taiwanese intelligence officer who teams up with a thief for a rescue operation in this slick action crime thriller from the director of Romeo Must Die.

programme.title: Along Came Polly
programme.desc: Ben Stiller and Jennifer Aniston star in this rom-com. A man, who hasnt taken a risk his entire life, decides its time for a change after his bride cheats on him.

programme.title: Sleepless In Seattle
programme.desc: Few romcoms top the chemistry between Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan in this charming tale. A widowers son calls a radio show to try and get his dad a partner.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Top comedian Eddie Murphy gives a heavyweight performance in this comedy. An obese man falls for a woman - and to win her heart, he creates a formula that makes him skinny.

programme.title: Blacklight
programme.desc: This action thriller finds Liam Neeson and Aidan Quinn on opposite sides of the law. A freelance government operative finds himself in the crosshairs of a man he once helped protect.

programme.title: Rambo: Last Blood
programme.desc: Almost four decades after he drew first blood, Sylvester Stallone is back as John Rambo. He must face his past and unearth his ruthless skills to exact revenge for a final mission.

programme.title: Set It Off
programme.desc: The saying, desperate times call for desperate measures, proves true in this action-packed film. Four Black women resort to robbing banks to end their struggles.

programme.title: Prey
programme.desc: A gripping survival thriller with religious elements. A group of plane crash survivors find themselves stranded and must fight for their survival.

programme.title: Atonement
programme.desc: Keira Knightley stars in this intricate tale of love and betrayal based on the best-selling novel. A childish misunderstanding leads to a devastating tragedy for one family.

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: A group of rescued refugees becomes prey in this thrilling horror. After their boat capsizes, the groups saviours reveal their true intentions and turn into ruthless manhunters.

programme.title: Bandit
programme.desc: Josh Duhamel drives this outrageous heist film based on a true story. After escaping prison, a career criminal assumes a new identity in Canada and goes on a crime spree.

programme.title: Shutter Island
programme.desc: Two US marshals are sent to a hospital on a remote island to investigate the disappearance of a murderer. Once there, they uncover the truth the staff is trying to keep hidden.

programme.title: Vampires House Of Cain
programme.desc: A fanged crime thriller. A detective investigating a series of murders is caught in a war between two Vampire clans.

programme.title: Jack The Giant Slayer
programme.desc: This fantasy film, loosely based on the classic fairy tale, sees the fabled Jack unwittingly reignite an ancient war between giants and humans.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: A great animation based on the hit video game. An island with happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious pigs and the only angry bird on the island is suspicious of them.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A star cast and the voice performance by Michael J. Fox drives his Oscar-nominated family classic in which a kind couple adopts a sweet mouse who faces danger from the house cat.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A Viking teenager being trained to fight dragons encounters and ultimately befriends one of the flying fire-breathers.

programme.title: Playing With Fire
programme.desc: Wrestler-turned-actor John Cena stars in this funny family comedy. When an elite firefighter team rescues three siblings, they face a task that they are not ready for: babysitting.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Adam Sandler stars in this zany comedy. An aggressive down-and-out hockey player realises that he can adapt his skills to golf. The problem is he doesnt fit into that world.

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: This tragic Oscar-nominated romantic drama gives two lost lovers another chance. After twenty years apart, childhood sweethearts reunite for one fateful week in New York City.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: Clive Owen and Naomi Watts risk everything in this action-packed film. An Interpol agent and an attorney team up to bring down a powerful bank engaged in illegal activities.

programme.title: Night Of The Hunted
programme.desc: An intense cat-and-mouse thriller. A woman finds herself the target of a crazy sniper with a secret vendetta after she stops at a remote gas station.

programme.title: U.S. Marshals
programme.desc: A game of cat and mouse unfolds in this exciting action movie. Oscar-winner Tommy Lee Jones is a US Marshal hunting down an escaped prisoner, played by Wesley Snipes.

programme.title: Get Carter
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone takes on an iconic role in this remake of the Michael Caine classic. A man seeks vengeance and justice after the mysterious death of his brother.

programme.title: A Good Person
programme.desc: Florence Pugh and Morgan Freeman star in this poignant drama about a young woman whose life spirals after an awful incident. She finds comfort and strength in an unexpected relationship.

programme.title: Santas Got Style
programme.desc: A stylish Christmas film. A department store executive decides to hire a young, fashionable Santa instead of a classic Santa.

programme.title: Veronica Mars
programme.desc: Fans of the TV show are in for a treat as Kristen Bell reprises her role as a former teen sleuth. Now a qualified lawyer, Veronica returns to her hometown to investigate a murder.

programme.title: Catch A Fire
programme.desc: A story of anti-apartheid activists in South Africa. Patrick Chamusso, a timid foreman at a synthetic fuel plant, is wrongly accused, imprisoned and tortured for an attempt to bomb the plant.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: This Oscar-nominated drama from the director of Troy sees an ambitious fisherman (George Clooney) and his crew caught in an unusually intense storm that puts them in mortal danger.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars as a mutated mariner who finds himself reluctantly helping a woman and a young girl find dry land, when most of the planet goes underwater.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Classic animated adventure for everyone. A cranky green ogre with a heart of gold leaves his swamp for the first time, and learns that the outside world isnt as bad as it seems.

programme.title: Puss In Boots: The Last Wish
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas returns as the swashbuckling cat. Puss in Boots is down to the last of his nine lives. So he sets out to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

programme.title: The Fabelmans
programme.desc: Renowned filmmaker Steven Spielberg helms this drama. A young man discovers a shattering family secret and explores how the power of movies helps us see the truth.

programme.title: Endangered Species
programme.desc: A wildlife thriller. Jack takes his friend and family to Kenya on vacation. But they get into an accident with a rhino in the reserve, leaving them to fight for their survival.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
programme.desc: Denzel Washington and John Travolta face off in this action thriller. A dispatcher takes on an armed group of men who take a train hostage and are seeking a ransom.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror movie, a group of teenagers suffer the consequences of messing with dark, evil forces beyond their control.

programme.title: Demonic
programme.desc: Neill Blomkamp (District 9) helms this horror film. An evil force is unleashed as a young woman enters a simulator to confront her mother about her traumatic past.

programme.title: Knives Out
programme.desc: This book-inspired murder mystery boasts an all-star cast led by Daniel Craig. When a famous crime writer is found dead, a seasoned detective is enlisted to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Not many films rival the visual spectacle of Christopher Nolans sci-fi epic. Leonardo DiCaprio and a stellar cast enter peoples dreams to steal corporate secrets.

programme.title: Zone 414
programme.desc: Guy Pearce drives this sci-fi thriller as a private investigator tasked with finding a tech billionaires missing daughter. He teams up with an advanced AI to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Dead Trigger: Unkilled
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic film that sees an elite soldier unit stepping in to save humanity when a virus decimates the world and creates zombie hordes.

programme.title: Our Almost Completely True Story
programme.desc: A sincere and hilarious love story. A short Jewish man pursues a tall, ageing Hollywood star.

programme.title: The Holiday Dating Guide
programme.desc: A delightful holiday romcom. To satisfy her publisher, a dating coach must prove her advice works by making a man fall for her by Christmas Eve in 12 days.

programme.title: The Barkers: Mind The Cats!
programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation. While on holiday with his dog family, Kid is eager to play with his siblings, but they are too busy. Luckily, Kid finds new friends: Cats.

programme.title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now...
programme.sub-title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now I Feel Kinda Left Out
programme.desc: A sci-fi comedy. A teen girl helps her space-obsessed neighbour to find his parents, whom aliens might have abducted.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale
programme.desc: A touching film. After rescuing a dolphin from a trap, a boy learns that the animals tail must be amputated, prompting him to convince a marine biologist to devise a solution.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: This adorable animation with an ensemble cast explores the world inside our phones, where emojis live and one multi-expressional emoji heads off on an adventure to discover his purpose.

programme.title: The Nut Job 2: Nutty By Nature
programme.desc: A silly adventure ensues for Surly the squirrel in this fun sequel. When the mayor of Oakton City plots to destroy their home, Surly and his friends must do all they can to stop him.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Redemption
programme.desc: Bruce Willis is the disgraced detective James Knight in this action movie. Caught in a jailbreak led by The Christmas Bomber, he must take out the terrorists to redeem himself.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: John Boyega leads the charge to cancel the apocalypse in the sequel to the epic sci-fi. Ten years after the war, a fallen hero reluctantly returns to battle a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson leads this larger-than-life monster movie. After animals are infected by a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop their deadly rampage.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Andrew Garfield returns for a second round of web-slinging action. Dangerous new enemies and family secrets weigh heavy on young Peter Parker as he struggles with his destiny.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson and Jason Statham drive this epic spin-off to the Fast franchise. They team up to stop a fierce Idris Elba, who plays a mercenary with a deadly virus.

programme.title: Perfectly Single
programme.desc: A conservative and socially awkward optometrist takes a leap of faith with a young suitor. Soon, her journey leads her down a path to self-discovery.

programme.title: Twisted Vines
programme.desc: A murder mystery that will keep you guessing. A wedding at a vineyard estate turns deadly when a body is discovered, and all the guests turn into suspects.

programme.title: Crescent Gang
programme.desc: A heartwarming family film. A group of kids in foster care embark on a scavenger hunt to save their home when they learn it is being sold and they will be separated.

programme.title: Shes All That
programme.desc: Freddie Prinze Jr. (Head Over Heels) stars in this high school romcom. After a popular boy in school gets dumped, he makes a bet that he can turn a nerd into a prom queen.

programme.title: Christmas Couples Retreat
programme.desc: An enjoyable Christmas movie that follows three couples who attend a retreat hoping to strengthen their respective relationships with the help of a relationship guru.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: When an artificially intelligent fighter jet goes rogue, it becomes a national security risk. The US Navys top defense pilots must it bring it down or risk world war.

programme.title: The Nutcracker And The Magic Flute
programme.desc: The classic Nutcracker tale gets a refreshing twist. As Marie wishes to escape her troubles, she shrinks to the size of her toys, which all come to life.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: When the murderous Lord Shen threatens China with a terrifying new weapon, Po must face a truth he never expected and defeat Shen for the good of Kung Fu.

programme.title: Fall
programme.desc: A nail-biting survival thriller. After climbing an abandoned 2000-foot radio tower, best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves trapped at the top with no way down.

programme.title: The Marksman
programme.desc: Liam Neeson takes matters into his own hands in this action thriller. A rancher on the Arizona border defends a young Mexican boy fleeing the cartel assassins.

programme.title: Midnight In The Switchgrass
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and Megan Fox face a deadly criminal in this action thriller. An FBI agent and Florida State officer team up to investigate a string of unsolved murder cases.

programme.title: Fear The Night
programme.desc: Maggie Q drives this action thriller. An Iraqi war veteran prepares to strike back after a group of home invaders attack during her sisters bachelorette party.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Independence
programme.desc: Bruce Willis returns as Detective James Knight in a tense conclusion to the trilogy. Can he save the day when a vigilante threatens to blow up the citys Fourth of July festivities?

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: A compelling British psychological thriller set in 1964. A switchboard operator receives a distressing call from a woman.

programme.title: The Goldfinch
programme.desc: A book-inspired drama about a young boy who lost his mother in a terrorist attack. He has a coveted painting stolen before the tragedy as a memento of his mothers death.

programme.title: Based On A True Story
programme.desc: Nathan plays a redemption match against a lifelong rival. The new serial killer haunting Los Angeles sends Ava a cipher to decode.

programme.title: Based On A True Story
programme.desc: Reeling from Nathans public embarrassment, he and Ava try to track down Drew. Matt and Tory plan their wedding ceremony. Matt gives into his dark desires.

programme.title: Teacup
programme.desc: Ruben and James seek help from the Navarros, Arlo reveals the truth about whats going on.

programme.title: Hacks
programme.desc: Deborah and Ava continue to try to get Late Night to rise in the ratings. Meanwhile, as Jimmy and Kayla attempt to rein in Dance Moms newfound success.

programme.title: Hacks
programme.desc: With the show stuck in third place, Deborah pitches a bold new strategy for Late Night. Nina arrives in LA with a plan to shake up Avas future.

programme.title: Riki Rhino: The Bird Kingdom
programme.desc: A fun, family adventure. Riki, a brave rhino, and his duck friend Beni journey through a tropical jungle to find a magic seed that will help save their home from a foreseen tsunami.

programme.title: Summertide
programme.desc: Tristan wants to help Yolande dance again. Martins suspicions of Lourens grow, and he confronts Charlie. Estella convinces Rebecca with a plan to burn down Salt and Fire.

programme.title: Happys Place
programme.desc: When the taverns health insurance is threatened to be cancelled, Gabby has a plan. Shell persuade her friend Danny to host his company party at Happys.

programme.title: Happys Place
programme.desc: When Bobbie catches Isabella doing a slow fade breakup with her long-distance boyfriend, she convinces her to send a Dear John letter.

programme.title: Watson
programme.desc: Watson runs into a brilliant con artist and an old friend of Sherlock Holmes, Irene Adler, when her son Angus is admitted to UHOP for temporary paralysis.

programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit
programme.desc: A thrilling finale. When a limousine with teenagers, including a senators son, is hijacked on the way to prom, MPU discovers that the ex-girlfriend of one of the victims may be the target.

programme.title: FBI: International
programme.desc: When an American student is found dead at a prestigious U.K. university, the Fly Team investigates an infamous secret society.

programme.title: American Idol
programme.desc: Season twenty-three of this icon Emmy-winning franchise has Ryan Seacrest return as host, Luke Bryan and Lionel Richie come back as judges, and are joined by season four winner Carrie Underwood.

programme.title: Destination X
programme.desc: In Venice, the players leave the bus behind but not the drama, daggers come out and loyalty is tested. A secret alliance is revealed in a dramatic exit.

programme.title: The Big Trip 3: Race Around The World
programme.desc: Mik-Mik, his family, and friends embark on their greatest adventure as a clumsy stork delivers the wrong baby again, and they search for it.

programme.title: Elsbeth
programme.desc: A thrilling season finale. When Elsbeth tries to solve a murder, she comes face-to-face with many familiar suspects.

programme.title: Allegiance
programme.desc: When a billionaire is found dead in his bathtub, Sabrina and Zaks investigation has them navigating the world of the .01 percent, feuding sisters, and people living on the margins.

programme.title: Law and Order: Organized Crime
programme.desc: A new wave of art activism puts the city on high alert and Vargas in the hot seat, Stabler is brought into a new unit to clear his old team from being their prime suspect.

programme.title: Survivor Australia: Australia V The...
programme.sub-title: Survivor Australia: Australia V The World. S12/E7 - Tastes Like Victory
programme.desc: The race is on as Australian and World Survivor heavyweights clash for the title of International Sole Survivor. Attempts to strengthen alliances are underway.

programme.title: Carte Blanche
programme.desc: What led to the death of a diplomat in Paris? What lies in the dark heart of the police? A historic locomotive gets a second lease on life.

programme.title: Black Bag
programme.desc: Michael Fassbender faces the ultimate test of loyalty in this espionage thriller. An intelligence officer is tasked with finding a mole, only to find his wife is a suspect.

programme.title: The Pitt
programme.desc: After an emotional debrief from Robby on a difficult case, Dana breaks up a waiting room brawl between two moms. Then, Whitaker finds common ground with The Kraken.

programme.title: And Just Like That...
programme.desc: Carrie unexpectedly extends her stay in Virginia. Aidan suggests she spend some time with his sons. Miranda follows Joys advice during an on-camera interview.

programme.title: Law and Order Toronto: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A very tense season two premiere. When an unhoused man is stabbed to death in a downtown park, Graff and Bateman are called to investigate.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When a gunman opens fire at a homeless shelter in Astoria, the team is led toward a killer with connections to a Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Dexter: Resurrection
programme.desc: In this pulsating premiere, Dexter Morgan awakens from a ten-week coma. As he begins a painful recovery and learns Harrison has fled to NYC.

programme.title: Based On A True Story
programme.desc: Matts past comes back to haunt Ava and Nathan. Ava realises her true crime obsession has become a dangerous addiction. When they try to leave it all behind, mysterious forces prevent them from escaping.

programme.title: Based On A True Story
programme.desc: In the season finale, Ava and Nathan find themselves on a game show with deadly stakes, while Tory and Matt are on the run from the police.

programme.title: My Mom, Jayne: A Film By Mariska...
programme.sub-title: My Mom, Jayne: A Film By Mariska Hargitay
programme.desc: A documentary about family and self-exploration looking at the legacy of Mariska Hargitays mother, Hollywood icon Jayne Mansfield.

programme.title: Summertide
programme.desc: A major accident devastates the Field and Solomons families. The families come together to support each other in grief.

programme.title: 1972: Munichs Black September
programme.desc: A powerful, explorative documentary that looks at the truth about the tragic massacre at the 1972 Olympic Games in Germany, through interviews.

programme.title: Happys Place
programme.desc: When the taverns health insurance is threatened to be cancelled, Gabby has a plan. Shell persuade her friend Danny to host his company party at Happys.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Charles and Archer treat a heart transplant patient who believes his new heart doesnt want to be in his body. Lenox takes a personal day. Asher discovers a mass on a pregnant womans ovary.

programme.title: Elsbeth
programme.desc: A thrilling season finale. When Elsbeth tries to solve a murder, she comes face-to-face with many familiar suspects.

programme.title: Survivor Australia: Australia V The...
programme.sub-title: Survivor Australia: Australia V The World. S12/E7 - Tastes Like Victory
programme.desc: The race is on as Australian and World Survivor heavyweights clash for the title of International Sole Survivor. Attempts to strengthen alliances are underway.

programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit
programme.desc: A thrilling finale. When a limousine with teenagers, including a senators son, is hijacked on the way to prom, MPU discovers that the ex-girlfriend of one of the victims may be the target.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Carte Blanche
programme.desc: What led to the death of a diplomat in Paris? What lies in the dark heart of the police? A historic locomotive gets a second lease on life.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen
programme.desc: Joel McHale (Community) hosts this outrageous culinary guessing game where bakers must decode what type of dessert was made when all thats left are the crumbs, flour trails, and a few elusive clues.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Hannah makes a tough call to save a life. Frost and Ripley treat a young boy with a snake bite. Archer gives Naomi a patient to handle on her own on her last day in the E.D.

programme.title: FBI: International
programme.desc: When an American student is found dead at a prestigious U.K. university, the Fly Team investigates an infamous secret society.

programme.title: Americas Got Talent
programme.desc: In the 20th season of this Emmy-nominated reality competition, the search continues for the countrys best talent. Howie Mandel, Sofía Vergara, and Simon Cowell return, joined by Mel B.

programme.title: Watson
programme.desc: Ingrids lies come back to haunt her when her sister Gigi needs to be treated by the team after she develops side effects to the secret treatments Ingrid put her through.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When the teams sex trafficking sting operation goes sideways, they race to recover a human trafficking victim. Meanwhile, Maggie makes a connection with a 911 operator to help find the girl before she disappears.

programme.title: The Pitt
programme.desc: With the Pitt understaffed, Robby looks to his team to pick up the slack. While Whitaker supports the wife of a burn victim, Samira takes the lead on a young gamer who suffered a stroke.

programme.title: Yellowjackets
programme.desc: The Yellowjackets attempt to spin a hundred suspicions into proof. Coach Scott has an existential meltdown and wonders if the universe really does hate him.

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Comedian John Oliver presents a satirical, insightful and well-researched look at current events in the US and around the globe. Oliver deep dives into pressing political, social and cultural issues.

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: A pulsating season twelve premiere. A month after Voights close brush with death, Intelligence is overwhelmed with cases as they catch a high-stakes drug bust.

programme.title: Reyka
programme.desc: Speelman slips through Reykas fingers but has to seek refuge in the harbour underworld. Reyka draws links between the cobber shop and Lovers Lane murders but struggles to unlock the killers identity.

programme.title: Lockerbie: A Search For Truth
programme.desc: A relentless premiere. After losing his daughter in the bombing of Pan Am Flight 103, Dr Jim Swire begins a quest for truth, searching for why this was allowed to happen.

programme.desc: Iris wants to get up to something naughty in the house and she better not get caught! Mpiyakhe wins the ETA to his side and then has a moment of genius and sees a way to bring conflict between ETA and WTA to rest forever.

programme.title: Isibaya
programme.desc: Whilst Samson looks forward to reaping the benefits of Mpiyakhes deal, Will Mkabayi find it in her heart to support her brother?

programme.title: Isibaya
programme.desc: As Mpiyakhe and Samson go head to head in negotiations, Jackson gets more than he bargained for. How will Mpiyakhe react when he discovers Thandeka is in love with his enemys son?

programme.desc: Finally, Mpiyakhe celebrates making a deal, but a terrible betrayal awaits him at home. Jabu manages to manipulate Lerato into some illicit behaviour. Whilst Thandeka and Sbu look forward to consummating their love.

programme.title: Ithonga
programme.desc: Lungelo puts his fears aside and makes a decision that shocks his family. The Magwazas continue to butt heads over the ghost that refuses to leave.

programme.title: Ithonga
programme.desc: Baneles defiance splits the Magwaza family as MaKhumalo faces an impossible choice. At the Dladla house, Iminathi tightens her grip.

programme.title: Ithonga
programme.desc: Banele breaks the heart of the one he loves the most as he says goodbye, and MaMbhele worries that Iminathi is tearing her sons apart.

programme.desc: Khutso, a single father raising his teenage son in suburban Gauteng, thinks he has his life under control until his old-school, jazz-obsessed father Madimetja arrives from Limpopo for a short visit that never ends.

programme.title: Ngicelivisa
programme.desc: Melusi built his marriage with Nokulunga on faith, sacrifice, and shared struggle. With his wife threatening divorce and his heart torn in two, Melusi asks for a visa to honour his vows.

programme.title: Ugembula Ngathi
programme.desc: Sinathi disappears for up to two weeks at a card gambling joint, leaving her husband Zachariah and their five children behind. Now fed up, Zachariah warns that he will move on if nothing changes.

programme.title: Gushlyf
programme.desc: Tensions rise when Collys wife and mother finally confront their growing rift. Samu confides a deeply personal secret to her aunt, revealing more than anyone expected.

programme.title: Wanyamalala
programme.desc: Gelly was left confused and heartbroken after her husband, Sfiso, ghosted her following a four-year marriage. Sfiso ghosted his wife after claiming he got a job in Mpumalanga.

programme.title: Isibaya
programme.desc: Mpiyakhe exiles Iris, but undaunted, she declares war against Shadrack. Jackson and Iris collude on a terrible plan. With peace restored, Sbu and Thandeka can finally publicly declare their love, but tragedy follows.

programme.desc: King Debezas desire for sons leads to an unexpected proposal. Khosis desperation is driving her to genuine insanity. Nodumo shows her true colours.
